condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF staff and partners are provided guidance, tools and resources to effectively design and manage programmes

description.narrative: A mapping exercise completed in 2016 indicated that UNICEF programmes are concentrated in 54% of the municipalities in BiH, with almost all of them being either highly or moderately deprived, indicating a strong focus on the most vulnerable. Effective programme management including of 4 UN Joint Programmes was assured | Status:Met | As-of Date:13/01/2017

title.narrative: Mid Year and Annual Review Completed

actual.value: 2016:4 - Mid year review and End year reviews in 2015 conducted and Mid-year review 2016 done in September 2016 and Annual Review in December 2016 together with the formulation of new WPs.
2016:PRIME updated and endorsed by CMT in March 2016, MYR for PRIME completed online by end Dec
2015:Completed in March 2015 and submitted to Regional Office
